HintText:
Fast Track: Date of the Fast Track hearing must be between 6 and 10 weeks.
Express pilot: Date of the express pilot hearing should be between 16 and 20 weeks.
Standard Track: Date of the hearing must be between 12 and 16 weeks

ElementLabel: Do you want to upload any other documents?
Please upload any additional documents related to your application.
Do you want to send a notice of hearing?
HintText: If you select 'yes' then the selected parties for this hearing will receive a hearing notice. If you select 'no', no notices will be sent to any of the selected parties. Only the selected parties will be able to view information relating to this hearing on the portal.

Standard Track: Date of the hearing must be between 12 and 16 weeks
